subject: RE: [junit] Junit 4.X design doc?
msgSnippet: Dear Shubha, I don t know of a comprehensive design document for JUnit 4.x. I did publish a paper about the early version of the 4.5 runner:

Dear Shubha,
 
I don't know of a comprehensive design document for JUnit 4.x. I did publish
a paper about the early version of the 4.5 runner:
www.threeriversinstitute.org/TwoMoreImplementationPatterns.htm. If you
explore the architecture, I encourage you to publish what you find.
 
Regards,
 
Kent Beck
Three Rivers Institute

  _____  

From: junit@yahoogroups.com [mailto:junit@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of
Shubha B S
Sent: Wednesday, September 10, 2008 11:48 PM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] Junit 4.X design doc?



Hi,
 
Could anybody help in getting Junit 4.X (junit 4.4) design doc anywhere if
it has been published?
 
thanks
Shubha
